mapper.insert: INSERT INTO info(userId, name, tier, `rank`, ment, selfPos, duoPos, playStyle, voice) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{tier}, #{rank}, #{ment}, #{selfPos}, #{duoPos}, #{playStyle}, #{voice})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, tier = #{tier}, rank = #{rank}, ment = #{ment}, selfPos = #{selfPos}, duoPos = #{duoPos}, playStyle = #{playStyle}, voice = #{voice}, WHERE id = #{userId}
